creditline: Courtesy of the artist and Goodman Gallery, South Africa
description: black and white photograph of a cemetary with a broken memorial in center; background has a cluster of small, rectangular buildings
title: Remains of a memorial to those killed by police in the "Langa Massacre", 21 March 1985, and to others killed in the struggle against apartheid. Kwanabuhle Cemetery, Uitenhage, Eastern Cape.
